view.utils.components

Class ImageComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

          • javax.swing.JPanel

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    ScaledImageComponent

    public class ImageComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A generic component to show images
